articles.title: Sony ZV-1 vlog camera dedicated to help out content creators - Micky News
articles.description: Sony officially announces its latest vlogging camera which embodies almost all the specs that content creators have been asking for.
articles.content:
The Verge has dubbed Sony ZV-1 as a “tiny vlogging powerhouse,” because it really is. It is designed most especially for content creators who shoot their footage themselves.
